title: Batch Requests
name: Batch
description: Returns results of batch requests POST JSON of api requests

title: Batch Request Metadata
name: BatchMetadata
description: Returns metadata of batch requests POST JSON of API requests metadata

title: Closed Issue Resolution Duration (Repo)
name: Closed_Issue_Resolution_Duration_Repo_
description: Duration of time for issues to be resolved. CHAOSS Metric Definition

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
[
    {
        "repo_id": 21682
        "repo_name":"incubator-dubbo",
        "gh_issue_number":4223,
        "issue_title":"Cloud Native PR",
        "created_at":"2019-05-31T07:55:44.000Z",
        "closed_at":"2019-06-17T03:12:48.000Z",
        "diffdate":16.0
    },
    {
        "repo_id": 21682,
         "repo_name":"incubator-dubbo",
        "gh_issue_number":4131,
        "issue_title":"Reduce context switching cost by optimizing thread model on consumer side.",
        "created_at":"2019-05-23T06:18:21.000Z",
        "closed_at":"2019-06-03T08:07:27.000Z",
        "diffdate":11.0
    }
]

title: Aggregate Summary (Repo)
name: aggregate_summary_repo
description: Returns the current count of watchers, stars, and forks and the counts of all commits, committers, and pull requests merged between a given beginning and end date (default between now and 365 days ago).

title: Aggregate Summary (Repo Group)
name: aggregate_summary_repo_group
description: Returns the current count of watchers, stars, and forks and the counts of all commits, committers, and pull requests merged between a given beginning and end date (default between now and 365 days ago).

title: Issue Comments Mean (Repo)
name: issue_comments_mean_repo
description: Mean(Average) of issue comments per day.

title: Issue Comments Mean Std (Repo)
name: issue_comments_mean_repo
description: Mean(Average) and Standard Deviation of issue comments per day.

title: Issue Comments Mean (Repo Group)
name: issue_comments_mean_repo_group
description: Mean(Average) of issue comments per day.

Parameter.description: Allows for results to be grouped by day, week, month, or year. E.g. values: year, day, month

title: Issue Comments Mean Std (Repo Group)
name: issue_comments_mean_std_repo_group
description: Mean(Average) and Standard Deviation of issue comments per day.

Parameter.description: Allows for results to be grouped by day, week, month, or year. E.g. values: year, day, month

title: Pull Request Acceptance Rate (Repo)
name: pull_request_acceptance_rate_repo
description: Timeseries of pull request acceptance rate (expressed as the ratio of pull requests merged on a date to the count of pull requests opened on a date)

title: Pull Request Acceptance Rate (Repo Group)
name: pull_request_acceptance_rate_repo_group
description: Timeseries of pull request acceptance rate (expressed as the ratio of pull requests merged on a date to the count of pull requests opened on a date)

Parameter.description: Allows for results to be grouped by day, week, month, or year. E.g. values: year, day, month

title: Top Committers (Repo)
name: top_committers_repo
description: Returns a list of contributors contributing N% of all commits.

Parameter.description: Specify the year to return the results for. Default value: current year
Specify N%. Accepts a value between 0 & 1 where 0 specifies 0% and 1 specifies 100%.

title: Top Committers (Repo Group)
name: top_committers_repo_group
description: Returns a list of contributors contributing N% of all commits.

Parameter.description: Specify the year to return the results for. Default value: current year
Specify N%. Accepts a value between 0 & 1 where 0 specifies 0% and 1 specifies 100%.

title: Filtered Metrics Status
name: filter_metrics_status
description: Metrics Status that allows for filtering of the results via the query string. Filters can be combined.

Parameter.description: Returns all the statuses of all metrics that have this tag
Returns all the metrics in this metric grouping
Returns the statuses of all metrics from this data source
Returns the statuses of the metrics of this metric type
Returns the statuses of metrics that are or aren't defined
